tool_description: Organizes equipment into transport cases with optimal weight distribution, protection requirements, and access priorities for wedding photography setups.

equipment_inventory.description: Complete equipment inventory with model numbers and sizes

case_types.description: Available case types (hard_case, soft_bag, rolling_case, backpack, pelican)

weight_limit.description: Weight limit per case in kilograms

fragility_priority.description: Whether to prioritize fragile equipment protection

error_messages: Empty equipment inventory: Provide at least one equipment item.
Empty case types: Specify at least one available case type.
Invalid transport method: Use car, flight, walking, or public_transport.
Invalid weight limit: Weight limit must be between 1 and 50 kg.
Equipment too large for available cases: Some equipment items don't fit in the specified case types.
usage: Provide your complete equipment list, available case types, and transportation method. Optionally set weight limits and fragility priorities. The tool will organize equipment into cases for optimal transport.

case_assignments.description: Equipment assignments for each transport case

weight_distribution.description: Weight of each packed case in kilograms
